Abstract.0: The Digital Atlas of Innovations presents the oldest evidence for innovations over a long time period. This collection presents the data/information at the basis of the atlas in stable and citable manner. For a dynamic representation of the data consult Atlas website.

Description.0: The Digital Atlas of Innovations presents the many great as well as small technical and social innovations in the early history of humankind in dynamic maps. In this repository the underlying data/tables are available for download or further analysis.
